thread.title: ‘Ram Mandir ka mamla zor shor se uthaenge’, says BJP MP Vinay Katiyar
thread.title_full: ‘Ram Mandir ka mamla zor shor se uthaenge’, says BJP MP Vinay Katiyar

author: FE Online
title: ‘Ram Mandir ka mamla zor shor se uthaenge’, says BJP MP Vinay Katiyar
text:
‘Ram Mandir ka mamla zor shor se uthaenge’, says BJP MP Vinay Katiyar ‘Ram Mandir ka mamla zor shor se uthaenge’, says BJP MP Vinay Katiyar Earlier Katiyar was in the news for his controversial 'sexist' remark against Congress leader Priyanka Gandhi, who is the star campaigner of Congress for Uttar Pradesh elections. By: FE Online | New Delhi | Updated: February 6, 2017 4:10 PM BJP MP Vinay Katiyar. Source: ANI 
Bharatiya Janata Party ( BJP ) MP Vinay Katiyar on Monday said that they will raise the ‘Ram temple’ issue strongly. He said, “Ram Mandir ka mamla zor shor se uthaenge, iska samadhan karenge kanoon ki drishti se. Zarurat padi to aage bhi kadam uthaenge” (We will strongly raise the ‘Ram mandir’ issue and will find a solution as per the law. If necessary, will take a step forward in this issue). Earlier Katiyar was in the news for his controversial ‘sexist’ remark against Congress leader Priyanka Gandhi, who is the star campaigner of Congress for Uttar Pradesh elections. 
You may also want to watch- 
This is not the first time Katiyar has made such a remark ahead of Uttar Pradesh Assembly polls which will begin from February 11 and will conducted in seven phases. Earlier on Janury 26 he said, “The Ram Mandir movement that was started by me 30 years ago became the base for the giant leap of BJP. Earlier on Janury 26 he said, “The Ram Mandir movement that was started by me 30 years ago became the base for the giant leap of BJP.” 
Apart from Vinay Katiyar, BJP MP Giriraj Singh also spoke about the Ram Mandir issue, he said, “Kab-kaise banega samay batayega, lekin Ram Mandir Bharat mein nahi banega, Ayodhya mein nahi banega to kya Pakistan mein banega.” Please Wait while comments are loading...
